title: Help!!! client wont launch after last update
body:
Okey this new Client is making me mad 
I click on the lol icon and boom nothing happens i try to the lollauncher.admin guess what nothing happens untill i got mad cuz i didnt play and wasted my time on talking with an admin who kepet saying the same stuff to me over and over. i started clicking on the icon several time and it launched but then it sayed it has to close so it updates so ok 208.1 mb then guess what samething lol dont start i figure d something like rebooting my pc and it worked then after i left for a bit cuz i was lagging same problem but worst it do not work even after rebooting my pc any ideas ???? O H yeah i downloaded over 1gb and half cuz of it
.
.
Note: if you have no idea how to help and keep sending me links that dont help please dont say anything and thank you for your time

replies.body: I really want to help you out here, but I'm a bit confused by the series of events.  Is your patcher appearing now, or still failing to show up?  If it is appearing, what issue are you experiencing?  The 1gb of data you see is likely a visual error.  Some game files had to be moved around during the update, but the patching is included that information.  The overall patch is not that big.
Yeah new Client is complete garbage
